factions.description: Shock Troops are genetically-enhanced superhuman soldiers who serve as the elite warriors of the Terran Empire. Shock Troops are larger, stronger, and faster than regular humans. They undergo rigorous training and are equipped with the finest weaponry and armor available, making them the ultimate fighting force against the myriad threats facing humanity.

A hivemind of insectoid abominations bred only to feed, the Swarm descends on worlds in an endless tide, stripping them of all life and biomass. Mindless yet coordinated, disposable yet adaptive, they are evolution weaponized - a galactic extinction event with claws, teeth, and hunger eternal.

Hailing from heavily industrialized and mineral-rich worlds, the StoneKin are a technologically adept and resilient people. They possess a society focused on mining, engineering, and crafting, with a deep reverence for their ancestors and the intricate machinery they built. Their civilization thrives in the depths of the asteroid belt and massive underground cities on their homeworlds.

The Ankh Revenants are a race of ancient, undying robotic warriors who once ruled the galaxy with an iron fist. Millennia ago, they were an organic species known as the Philacterites, whose frail bodies and short lifespans drove them to seek immortality. In their quest for eternal life, they made a pact with the malevolent star gods, sacrificing their flesh and souls to become immortal machines.
A faction for solo play, representing non-player enemies with defined AI behaviors.

gears.description: Each time this Unit performs the Melee Combat Action, targets get -1 ARM.
Each time this Unit climbs up, the vertical distance it moves counts for 1 less Square. Each time it climbs down, the vertical distance it moves counts for 2 less Squares.
When a Squadmate within 2 Squares is the target of Ranged Combat, you may treat this Unit as the target instead.
At the end of this Unit's Activation, this Unit may perform a free Basic Action it has not yet performed during its Activation.

Select one Square visible to and within 3 Squares of this Unit. Inflict 2 Damage on that Square and all Adjacent Squares visible to that Square.
This Unit may only perform this Action once per mission. This Unit cannot perform this Action while Adjacent to enemy Units.

This Unit may Hide for 1 ACT. While Hidden, this Unit may only perform the Move, Dash, Melee Combat, or Mission Actions. While Hidden, this Unit cannot be the primary target of Ranged Combat for Units that are further than 3 Squares away.
This Unit may spend 1 ACT to come out of hiding.
When this Unit performs the Melee Combat Action, for each Critical Success, it may choose to restore 1 HIT instead of dealing damage to the Target.
This Unit gets one additional auto-save as a result of Cover.
At the start of this Unit's Activation, inflict 1 Damage on all Adjacent enemy Units.
At the start of each Turn, this Unit recovers 1 lost HIT.
A Squadmate within 4 Squares of this Unit immediately performs one Free Action. This Unit may not perform this Action in the same Turn in which it performed the Repair Action.

This Unit is always considered to be in Cover.
This Unit may move through enemy Units.
Each time an enemy Unit passes through or ends a move in an Adjacent Square to this Unit, inflict 1 Damage on that enemy Unit..
This Unit may target an enemy in Ranged Combat that is Adjacent to a Squadmate that is not the Prime Ankh.
Select a Squadmate or this Unit. Until the end of the Turn, the selected Unit may move 2 additional Squares when it performs a Move action.

Select a Squadmate or this Unit. Until the end of the Turn, the selected Unit is always considered to be in Cover. Each time the selected Unit would lose a HIT, roll 1D6: on a 1 or 2, that HIT is not lost.
Select an enemy Unit in this Unit's Line of Sight. Until the end of the Turn, that selected enemy Unit cannot re-roll any of its dice (for Attacks, Armor Saves, etc).
Each time this Unit makes a Ranged attack, if a Secundus Squadmate is visible to this Unit, you can treat that Secundus as the active Unit for the purposes of determining Line Of Sight.
This Unit's Bayonet gains RND1 - Rending: Up to 1 Critical Success count as 3 successful strikes instead of 2.
A Squadmate within 4 Squares of this Unit immediately recovers 1D3 lost HIT. This Unit may not perform this Action in the same Turn in which it performed the Catalyse Action.
During each of its Activations, this Unit may perform one Mission action for 1 less ACT.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Each time this Unit performs the Melee Combat action and it has at least one Critical Strike, the target gets -1 ARM.

Each time this Unit performs the Melee Combat action and it rolls a 6, it takes 1 Damage.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, its Melee weapons gain +1 ATT
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, it may re-roll failed strikes and Armor saves

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*

- **Passive:** Each time this Unit Moves or Dashes into an enemy-Adjacent Square, the next time it performs the Melee Combat action in the same Activation, it gains +1 ATT
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, its Melee Weapons gain +1 ATT.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, its Melee Weapons have SKL 5.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
 Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
 Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*

- **Passive:** Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee or Ranged Combat Action and it has at least one Squadmate within 3 Squares, it may re-roll up to 1 of its Armor Save rolls.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, each time it performs the Ranged Combat Action, it can treat a Squadmate within its Line Of Sight as the attacker for the purposes of determining Line Of Sight and Cover.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, each time it performs the Melee or Ranged Combat Action and it is within 4 Squares of a Squadmate, its Weapons have +1 SKL.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** When this Unit reaches 0 HIT, it may perform one free basic or mission action before being removed from the battlefield
- **1 TO:** Until the end of the Turn, treat this Unit as controlling an objective it is adjacent to even if this Unit or that objective is adjacent to enemies. If this unit is Taken Out by the end of the Turn, treat the objective normally (this Unit does not control that objective).
- **1 TO:** This Unit and all Squadmates may perform a free Move action but only toward the closest objective.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad. Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission. Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*   - **Passive:** During each of its Activations, this Squad's Leader may choose to take no actions. If it does, it may choose 2 Squadmates to perform 1 Free Action each, or 1 Squadmate to perform 2 different Free Actions. - **1 TO:** Select one of the Squad Leader's Weapons. Until its next Activation, this Unit may use that Leader's selected weapon instead of one of its own weapons. - **1 TO:** This Unit may trade up to 2 HIT with its leader (+ or -)

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Enemy Units that are the target of Melee Combat may not use their Unit Specials or Skills to re-roll failed Armor Saves. They may still re-roll or modify failed Armor Saves using TOs.
- **1 TO:** This Unit may perform a Free Move Action.
- **1 TO:** Select one Squadmate. Swap the position of this Unit and the selected Squadmate.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Each time this Unit climbs up, the vertical distance it moves counts for 1 less Square. Each time it climbs down, the vertical distance it moves counts for 2 less Squares.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, each time it performs the Move or Dash Action, it may move through enemy-occupied Squares.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, each time it performs the Move Action, it may move 3 additional Squares.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** This Unit may re-roll failed Armor Save rolls of 6
- **1 TO:** When a Unit first reaches 0 HIT, do not remove it from the battlefield. Instead, it remains on the battlefield with 1 HIT.
- **1 TO:** Select one Unit. That selected Unit immediately gains +2 HIT.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Each time this Unit is the target of a Ranged Combat attack, if it is in Cover, it may re-roll failed Armor Save rolls.
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, it cannot be targeted by ranged attacks if the attacker is 3 Squares away or more
- **1 TO:** Until this Unit's next Activation, it may move an additional 3 Squares each time if performs the Move Action.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Each time this Unit performs a Combat action, it may reroll a number of attack dice equal to the number of Squadmates that have been Taken Out (max 3).
- **1 TO:** This unit performs a free Combat action at +1 ATT against the last enemy Unit that performed a Combat action against a Squadmate.
- **1 TO:** Select one enemy Unit in this Unit's Line Of Sight. This Unit and all Squadmates may immediately perform a free Combat action against that enemy Unit if it is a valid target.

*Squad Specialty: Select one Squad Specialty to apply to all Units in this Squad.
Passives apply to all Units in the Squad throughout the Mission.
Each TO can only be used once in each Mission.*


- **Passive:** Enemies that start a Move action within 4 Squares of this Unit may only move up to 2 Squares.
- **1 TO:** Select one enemy Unit. During that enemy Unit's next Activation, it gains -1 ACT
- **1 TO:** Select one of the following effects to apply to this Unit during this Activation:

- It may ignore vertical distance while climbing up or down terrain.

- The next time it is the target of a Combat action, it may re-roll failed Armor Saves

- All Adjacent Enemy Units take 1 Melee Damage
The Unit gets -1 SKL to its Melee weapons (minimum 1).
The Unit gets -1 ARM (minimum 1).
The Unit has perished. Remove it from your Squad. It cannot be replaced until it returns to Homebase.
This Unit's Melee Weapons get -1 ATT.
This Unit's Ranged Weapons get -1 ATT.
The Unit gets -1 SKL to its Ranged weapons (minimum 1).
Remove one Injury from this Unit.
Each time the Unit performs the Move action, it moves 1 less Square.

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If there is a valid Melee target, attack that target in Melee combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move + Dash (2 actions) to be adjacent to closest enemy Unit
- Move toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible
- Dash toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If there is a valid Melee target, attack that target in Melee combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move + Dash (2 actions) to be adjacent to closest enemy Unit
- Move toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible
- Dash toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If there is a valid Melee target, attack that target in Melee combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move + Dash (2 actions) to be adjacent to closest enemy Unit
- Move toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible
- Dash toward closest enemy Unit, to cover if possible

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If this Unit is Adjacent to an enemy Unit, Dash or Move away from all enemy Units.
- If there is a valid Ranged target, attack that target in Ranged combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an objective
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an objective

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If this Unit is Adjacent to an enemy Unit, Dash or Move away from all enemy Units.
- If there is a valid Ranged target, attack that target in Ranged combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an objective
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an objective

*Use these rules to determine this Unit's behavior. For each ACT, start at the top of the list and move to the next item if that action is not possible.*


- If this Unit is Adjacent to an enemy Unit, Dash or Move away from all enemy Units.
- If there is a valid Ranged target, attack that target in Ranged combat. This Unit may perform this action twice.
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Move to cover with Line of Sight on an objective
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an enemy Unit
- Dash to cover with Line of Sight on an objective
This Unit gains +1 ACT (maximum 3).
Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Attack, the Attacker does not get any support modifiers from its Squadmates in adjacent Squares.
Until the end of the Turn, all Units in this Squad gain +1 ATT on their Melee weapons. This can only be done once per mission
Until the end of the Turn, all Units in this Squad gain +1 ATT on their Melee weapons. This can only be done once per mission
Target one Enemy. This Unit and all its Squadmates immediately perform a Free Ranged or Melee attack against that Enemy if it is a valid target. This can only be done once per mission
During each of its Activations, this Unit may perform one Mission action for 1 less ACT.

Select one Square visible to and within 3 Squares of this Unit. Inflict 2 Damage on that Square and all Adjacent Squares visible to that Square. This Unit may only perform this Action once per mission. This Unit cannot perform this Action while Adjacent to enemy Units.
This Unit's Melee weapon gains +1 ATT.
Once per Mission, this unit may spend 2 ACT to move up to 6 Squares in a straight line (orthogonal or diagonal), ignoring vertical movement and difficult terrain.

This Unit gains LDR2: While this Unit is Standing, you may roll an additional 2 dice to determine Tactical Orders every turn.
This Unit gains +1 HIT, ARM, and ACT, and +1 SKL to its Weapons.

Select either this Unit or an Adjacent Squadmate. That selected Unit recovers 1D3 lost HIT.
This Unit cannot perform this action if this Unit or the selected Unit is Adjacent to any enemy Units.
One time per Turn, when a Squadmate of this Unit within 4 Squares goes to 0 HIT, roll 1D6. On a 2 or lower, that Squadmate is not Taken Out and has 1 HIT remaining.

Target an enemy in an adjacent Square. Inflict 2 Damage on that enemy, then move that enemy up to 2 Squares in any direction. If this causes the enemy to fall off terrain, it takes Damage equal to the number of vertical Squares it fell.

This unit may spend 1 ACT to issue an order to a Squadmate in its Line of Sight. That Squadmate immediately performs a Free Action, then this unit's activation is resumed.
This Unit cannot perform this action if this Unit or the selected Unit is Adjacent to any enemy Units.
Until the end of the Turn, enemy Units do not benefit from Cover
This Unit's Squad gains +1 TO.

This unit may spend 1 ACT to issue an order to a Squadmate in its Line of Sight. That Squadmate immediately performs a Free Action, then this unit's activation is resumed.
This Unit cannot perform this action if this Unit or the selected Unit is Adjacent to any enemy Units.
Until the end of the Turn, enemy Units do not benefit from Cover
This Unit's Squad gains +1 TO.
During each of its Activations, this Unit may perform one Mission action for 1 less ACT.
This Unit may re-roll up to 1 of its Ranged Combat attack dice. This is cumulative with other Accurate specials (e.g. on this Unit's weapons).
This Unit may re-roll up to 1 of its Melee Combat attack dice. This is cumulative with other Brutal specials (e.g. on this Unit's weapons).
Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Attack, if this Unit is not Taken Out at the end of that Combat, it may immediately perform a Melee Attack against the original Attacker.
Each time this Unit is the target of a Ranged Combat attack, it may re-roll up to 1 of its Armor Saves. This is cumulative with other Dodge specials.
The Squad can spend an additional 5GP on Units and Gear. Increase the Squad's MaxGP by 5.
Each time this Unit rolls Armor Saves, results of 1 and 2 count as Critical Saves.
This Unit's Melee weapons gain + 1 ATT.
This Unit's Ranged weapons gain + 1 ATT.
During each of its Activations, this Unit may perform one Mission action for 1 less ACT.
Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Combat attack, it may re-roll up to 1 of its Armor Saves. This is cumulative with other Tough specials.
This Unit's Melee weapons gain Brutal 1 (BRU1).
When this Unit reaches 0 HIT, it may perform one free basic or mission action before being removed from the battlefield.

Select one Square visible to and within 3 Squares of this Unit. Inflict 2 Damage on that Square and all Adjacent Squares visible to that Square.
This Unit may only perform this Action once per mission. This Unit cannot perform this Action while Adjacent to enemy Units.
This Unit's Heavy weapons don't limit its movement and it can move normally.
This Unit gains +1 HIT, +1 Ranged and Melee SKL, and LDR2.

Select either this Unit or an Adjacent Squadmate. That selected Unit recovers 1D3 lost HIT.
This Unit cannot perform this action if this Unit or the selected Unit is Adjacent to any enemy Units.

This unit may spend 1 ACT to issue an order to a Squadmate in its Line of Sight. That Squadmate immediately performs a Free Action, then this unit's activation is resumed. This Unit cannot perform this action if this Unit is Adjacent to any enemy Units.

This Unit carries a Smoke Grenade. Once per mission, this Unit may throw its Smoke Grenade by placing a Smoke token in a Square that is up to 4 Squares away from it and within its Line Of Sight. Until the end of the Turn, that Square and all adjacent Squares, and all Squares above those Squares are considered Smoke Squares. Smoke Squares block Line Of Sight and Units that are in a Smoke Square cannot perform Ranged Attacks against any other Units. This Unit may not perform this action while Adjacent to any enemy Units.
During each of its Activations, this Unit may perform one Mission action for 1 less ACT.
Each time this Unit climbs up, the vertical distance it moves counts for 1 less Square. Each time it climbs down, the vertical distance it moves counts for 2 less Squares.
Each time this Unit performs the Dash action, it costs one less ACT. This means that the first time this Unit performs a Dash in each of its Activations, it costs zero ACT.
This Squad gets its leader's Leader effect even if the leader is Taken Out.
After this Unit Takes Out an enemy in Melee Combat, place a Swarm Spawn Unit in the Square that enemy Unit occupied.
Squadmates may target an enemy Unit that is adjacent to this Unit in Ranged combat.
During each of its Activations, this Unit may choose to take no actions. If it does, it may choose 2 Squadmates to perform 1 Free Action each, or 1 Squadmate to perform 2 different Free Actions.
All other Units in this Squad (excluding this Unit) may immediately perform a Move action followed by a Melee attack. This can only be done once per mission.

This Unit cannot be added to your Squad before a Mission. Instead, it is added during Missions if the Brood Mother uses its Infest ability. At the end of each Mission, remove all Spawn Units from your Squad.

missions.title: Eradicate
missions.description:
*"No mercy. No survivors."*  
  

The battlefield is a crucible of war, where only the strongest will remain standing. Smoke rises from shattered ruins, and the air is thick with the acrid scent of plasma burns. No objectives. No negotiations. Only death. Each squad knows that by the end of this conflict, only one will be left standing, while the other will be nothing but a memory.
missions.setup: Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.
missions.deployment: During Turn 1, when it is a Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on your Battlefield edge.
missions.victory: At the end of Turn 4, if a Squad Took Out all enemy units, that Squad wins. In all other cases, the Mission is a Draw.

missions.title: Defend
missions.description:
*"Hold the line until help arrives - or die trying."*  
  

A beleaguered squad finds itself cornered, their backs against the wall as enemy forces close in from all sides. Their only hope: surviving long enough for extraction. The air crackles with tension as enemy shadows move through the ruins, searching for weaknesses in the defenses. Every second counts. Every bullet fired could be the last. If they falter, they will be wiped out. If they endure, they will live to fight another day.
missions.setup:
Set up terrain so that the central tile is at least half enclosed. This is the Defense area.  
Select or randomly pick one Squad to be the Attacker, and the other to be the Defender.
missions.deployment:
Defender deploys all their Units before Turn 1 in the center tile.  
Attacker deploys all their Units before Turn 1 on any Square along any Battlefield edge.
missions.victory: At the end of Turn 4, each Squad adds up the GP of Standing Units on the central tile. The Squad with the highest total wins the Mission. In case of a tie, the Defender wins the Mission.

missions.title: Sabotage
missions.description:
*"Cut them off at the source."*  
  

Deep behind enemy lines, a squad is tasked with crippling vital infrastructure. Fuel lines, power grids, and command centers must be neutralized before reinforcements arrive. Every step is fraught with danger - enemy patrols scour the area, drones sweep the perimeter, and time is running out. Stealth and precision will ensure success, but failure means a swift and brutal counterattack.
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Place 3 Sabotage markers in the center of three random tiles.  
Select or randomly pick one Squad to be the Attacker, and the other to be the Defender.
missions.deployment: During Turn 1, when it is a Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on your Battlefield edge.
missions.victory:
The Attacker Squad wins the mission if all three markers have been sabotaged by the end of Turn 4.  
The Defender Squad wins the mission in all other cases.
missions.special: **Sabotage (2 ACT):** A Unit may Sabotage a marker in the same Square it occupies if there are not Adjacent enemy Units.

missions.title: Retrieve Intel
missions.description:
*"Secrets win wars. Get in, get out."*  
  

Somewhere in the heart of the battlefield lies a critical piece of intelligence - data that could shift the balance of power. One squad races to retrieve it, while the other fights to keep it from falling into enemy hands. The clock is ticking. One wrong move could mean the difference between victory and disaster. In the chaos of battle, can the attackers escape with the prize, or will the defenders crush their ambitions before they reach safety?
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Place an Intel marker in the center of the central tile.  
Select or randomly pick one Squad to be the Attacker, and the other to be the Defender.
missions.deployment: During Turn 1, when it is a Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on your Battlefield edge.
missions.victory:
The Attacker Squad wins the mission when a Unit carrying the Intel marker walks off the edge of the Battlefield opposite the Attacker's deployment edge by the end of Turn 4.  
The Defender Squad wins the mission in all other cases.

missions.title: Assassinate
missions.description:
*"Cut off the head, and the body dies."*  
  

Every army has a leader, a figure who commands, inspires, and ensures victory. Without them, morale crumbles and cohesion shatters. One squad has been given a singular, deadly mission: eliminate the enemy commander at all costs. But this will not be easy - the target is well-guarded, and their forces will fight to the last breath to protect them. Strike fast, strike true, and end this war with a single, decisive kill.
missions.setup: Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.
missions.deployment: During Turn 1, when it is a Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on your Battlefield edge.
missions.victory:
The first Squad to Take Out the enemy Leader wins the mission if it happens before Turn 4.  
All other cases are a Draw.

missions.title: Control
missions.description:
*"Seize the ground. Own the fight."*  
  

Key strategic locations are up for grabs, and both squads are determined to claim them. These positions may be artillery nests, communication hubs, or tactical vantage points - whoever controls them controls the battlefield. Explosions send shockwaves through the war-torn streets as both sides fight tooth and nail, knowing that every inch gained is another step toward ultimate victory.
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Place 3 Objective markers in the center of the West, Central, and East tiles.
missions.deployment: Both Squads deploy their Units on their selected Battlefield edge before Turn 1.
missions.victory:
At the end of each Turn, Squads score 1 MP for each Objective they control.  
The Squad with the most MP by the end of Turn 4 wins the Mission.

missions.title: Intercept
missions.description:
*"No one escapes."*  
  

A lone operative carries intelligence that could change the course of the war. If they reach their destination, the enemy will gain a decisive advantage. But their pursuers are relentless, striking from the shadows and closing in with ruthless efficiency. The chase is on, across shattered landscapes and under the constant threat of ambush. The defenders must reach safety. The attackers must ensure they never do.
missions.setup: Select or randomly pick one Squad to be the Attacker. The other Squad is the Defender.   Defender secretly selects one of its Units to carry the Intel. This Intel may be dropped by any Unit carrying it. Any Unit may pick up the dropped Intel. If a Unit carrying Intel is Taken Out, place the Intel marker in its previously-occupied Square.
missions.deployment:
Before Turn 1, Attacker deploys all units anywhere in the Northeast, East, or Southeast Tiles.  
During Turn 1, when it is a Defender Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on the outer edge of the Western tile.
missions.victory:
If a Defender Unit carrying the Intel walks off the outer edge of the Eastern tile, the Defender Squad wins.  
In all other cases, the Attacker Squad wins.

missions.title: Rivals
missions.description:
*"This ends here."*  
  

Some battles are personal. Amidst the larger war, two warriors - each sworn to end the other - step onto the battlefield for their final confrontation. They have crossed paths before, leaving behind scars and grudges that cannot be ignored. Their squads fight around them, but the true battle is between these two rivals. Only one will walk away.
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Each Squad selects one enemy Unit (excluding the Leader) to be Rivals.
missions.deployment: Both Squads deploy their Units on their selected Battlefield edge before Turn 1.
missions.victory:
The first Squad to Take Out its selected rival Unit wins the Mission.  
Rivals cannot be the primary target of combat except if the attacker is the other Squad's Rival.

missions.title: Bug Bounty
missions.description:
*"The hive stirs. Kill them before they overwhelm us."*  
  

Something is stirring beneath the battlefield - something ancient, hungry, and unstoppable. A horde of alien creatures has erupted from below, their chitinous bodies swarming over the land, attacking anything that moves. Both squads find themselves trapped in a desperate fight for survival. The mission? Kill as many of these creatures as possible before they are overrun. The battlefield is a feeding ground, and every shot fired is a battle against extinction.
missions.setup:
Deploy 3 Spawn Points, one in the center of the West, Center, and East Tiles.  
At the start of each Turn, each player rolls 1D3 for each Spawn Point and spawns that number of Bugs at that Spawn Point.
missions.deployment:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Both Squads deploy from their Battlefield edge before Turn 1.
missions.victory:
Each time a Squad Takes Out a Spawn Point, that Squad scores 2 MP.

At the end of Turn 4, the Squad with the most MP wins the Mission.
missions.special:
|**Unit**|**ACT**|**ARM**|**HIT**|
|---|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|Bug|2|3|1|
|**Weapon**|**ATT**|**SKL**|
|(M) Bite|3|5|

Bug Units are activated after each player Unit activation, alternating player control.  

|**Item**|**ACT**|**ARM**|**HIT**|
|---|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|Spawn Point|-|4|2|

Spawn Points are treated as items. If a Spawn Point is targeted in combat and is not Taken Out as a result of that combat, it regains all of its HIT.
Each time a Spawn Point is targeted in combat and is not Taken out as a result, for each saved successful strike, spawn one Bug Adjacent to that Spawn Point.

missions.title: Scavenge
missions.description:
*"Every resource counts in a war of attrition."*  
  

Scattered across the battlefield are vital supplies - ammunition, rations, medical kits. In the chaos of war, every bit of gear can mean the difference between survival and death. But retrieving these supplies is no simple task. The enemy is just as desperate, and they will fight tooth and nail to claim the resources first. The race is on. Who will scavenge the most before the battlefield turns into a graveyard?
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Place 3 Supply markers in the center Square of the West, Center, and East tiles.
missions.deployment: Both Squads deploy from their selected Battlefield edge before Turn 1.
missions.victory:
Each time a Unit Scavenges a Supply marker, its Squad scores 1 MP. That Supply cannot be scavenged again during this Turn.  
At the end of Turn 4, the Squad with the most MPs wins the Mission.
missions.special: **Scavenge (1 ACT):** The Unit Scavenges a Supply marker in its current Square. The Unit's Squad scores 1 MP. A Unit may not perform this action if it is Adjacent to an enemy Unit.

missions.title: Extract
missions.description:
*"Get to the evac point before it’s too late."*  
  

The sky glows with incoming bombardments, shaking the ground with every impact. There is no time to waste - both squads must make it to the extraction point before they are wiped out. Every step forward is met with resistance, every moment brings them closer to doom. The countdown has begun. Who will make it out alive, and who will be left behind?
missions.setup: Select one Battlefield edge to be the Deployment edge, and the opposite one to be the Extraction edge.
missions.deployment: During Turn 1, when it is a Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on Deployment edge.
missions.victory: At the end of Turn 4, add the total GP of all Units that successfully extracted. The Squad with the highest extracted GP wins the Mission.
missions.special: **Extract (2 ACT):** If a Unit is on the Extraction edge, it may perform this action. If it does, that Unit is successfully extracted.

missions.title: Infiltrate
missions.description:
*"Silent. Deadly. Unstoppable."*  
  

Under the cover of darkness, a squad moves through enemy territory, their goal clear - breach the defenses and secure a foothold within the enemy’s base. Their foes are unaware, but not for long. The first shot fired will set off a chain reaction of chaos and violence. Can the attackers slip through and establish their presence, or will the defenders crush the intrusion before it begins?
missions.setup:
Each Squad selects one of two opposing Battlefield edges to be their Deployment zone.  
Select one Squad to be the Attacker and the other to be the Defender.
missions.deployment:
Before Turn 1, Defender deploys their Units anywhere on their Battlefield Edge.  
During Turn 1, when it is an Attacker Unit's turn to activate, deploy it in any Square on its Battlefield edge.  
Attacker has initiative in the first Turn.
missions.victory: At the end of Turn 4, if the Attacker has 2 or more Units on the Defender's Battlefield edge that are not Adjacent to any enemy Units, the Attacker wins the Mission. Defender wins in all other cases.

battlefields.title: The Ruined City
battlefields.description: Once a bustling metropolis, the city now lies in ruins, its skyline broken by jagged silhouettes of collapsed towers and scorched facades. Streets that once thrived with life are choked with debris, the remnants of homes, businesses, and dreams reduced to ash and rubble. Shadows of destruction linger in the form of burnt-out vehicles and craters that scar the land, while the acrid smell of smoke and decay hangs in the air.
battlefields.setup: Dense terrain, ruined buildings and corners
battlefields.effects: **Collapse:** At the start of each Turn after the first, select one random terrain element. For each Square of height of that terrain element, deal 1 Damage to each Unit within that terrain element's footprint or Adjacent to that terrain element, then remove it from the battlefield.

battlefields.title: The Facility
battlefields.description: The industrial facility stands as a monument to neglect, its once-thrumming machinery now silent and encased in layers of rust. Massive gears and conveyor belts hang motionless, their surfaces corroded and flecked with peeling paint, hinting at decades of disuse. Cracked windows let in shafts of pale light that illuminate the grime-covered floors littered with broken tools and tangled wires.
battlefields.effects: **Darkness:** At the start of each Turn after the first, select one random Tile. Until the end of the Turn, Units on that Tile cannot be targeted for Ranged combat if the Attacker is more than 3 Squares away.

battlefields.title: The Jungle
battlefields.description: The alien jungle pulses with a life both mesmerizing and menacing, its dense canopy blotting out the sky and casting the undergrowth in an eternal twilight. Massive, twisted trees with glowing veins of bioluminescent sap tower above, their roots forming treacherous mazes through the thick, spongy ground. Vines slither like serpents, some twitching with sentience, while predatory plants snap at anything that brushes their razor-edged leaves.
battlefields.setup: Dense foliage, little to no elevated terrain.
battlefields.effects: **Stinging Cloud:** At the start of each Turn after the first, select one random Standing Unit. That Unit moves 3 Squares in random directions (roll three times). If that Unit cannot make a valid move because of wall or other obstacle, it takes 1 Melee Damage.

battlefields.title: The Alien Hive
battlefields.description: The alien hive looms like a grotesque monolith, its surface an undulating mass of organic textures that pulse faintly with a sickly bioluminescent glow. Towering spires of chitin and resin twist skyward, connected by sinewy bridges that shimmer with an oily sheen. The air is thick and humid, carrying a metallic tang that clings to the throat with every breath. Inside, winding tunnels spiral downward into a labyrinth of chambers, their walls coated in sticky, fibrous webs that pulse rhythmically, as if alive.
battlefields.setup: Caverns, tight quarters, no elevated terrain
battlefields.effects: **Noxious Gas:** At the start of each Turn after the first, select one random Tile. All Units on that Tile take 1 Damage.

battlefields.title: The Cursed Temple
battlefields.description: The cursed temple rises from the earth like a jagged scar, its crumbling stone walls etched with the maddening sigils of ancient, terrible gods. A perpetual gloom surrounds the structure, as if sunlight dares not touch its malevolent facade. Its towering spires are wrapped in withered vines, and its gateways yawn like the gaping mouths of forgotten horrors. Inside, the air is suffocating and thick with the scent of damp stone and decayed offerings. Faint whispers echo through the dark corridors, carrying fragmented words in a language long lost to time.
battlefields.setup: Dense terrain, ruined buildings and corners.
battlefields.effects: **Cursed Spirits:** At the start of each Turn after the first, select one random Unit. That Unit is overtaken by the temple's restless spirits and immediately attacks the closest Unit in Combat, Squadmate or enemy.

specials.description: Each time this Unit performs the Ranged Combat action, it may re-roll up to _ of its Attack dice.
Each time this Unit performs the Melee Combat action, it may re-roll up to _ of its Attack dice.
Each time this Unit is the primary target of a Ranged Combat attack and the Attacker is at least 3 Squares away, the Attacker's SKL is reduced by 1 (minimum 1).
Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Attack, if this Unit is not Taken Out at the end of that Combat, it may immediately perform a Melee Attack against the original Attacker.
Each time this unit is the target of a Melee Attack, the Attacker's SKL is reduced by 1 (minimum 1).
Each time this Unit is the target of a Ranged Combat attack, it may re-roll up to _ of its Armor Saves.
This Unit ignores vertical distance when it performs a Move or Dash action and it is not affected by Difficult terrain.
Each time this Unit rolls Armor Saves, results of 1 and 2 count as Critical Saves.
This Unit may deploy anywhere on the battlefield, at least 3 Squares away from enemy Units and objectives. If it cannot be deployed in this way, deploy it normally according to the mission briefing.
While this Unit is Standing, you may roll an additional _ dice to determine Tactical Orders every turn.
This Unit cannot be equipped with gear that costs Gear Points (GP), does not gain XP, never get Injuries, and cannot take any Spoils Of War.

Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Attack, before rolling Armor Saves, it may choose one of the Attacker's Attack Dice to be re-rolled before rolling Armor Saves, but only if the Attacker hasn't already re-rolled that die.
Each time this Unit's Squadmates target an enemy in Ranged combat, if this Unit has Line of Sight on that target, the target does not benefit from Cover.
Each time this Unit performs the Dash action, it costs one less ACT. This means that the first time this Unit performs a Dash in each of its Activations, it costs zero ACT.
Each time this Unit performs a Mission action, it costs one less ACT. This means that the first time this Unit performs a Mission action in each of its Activations, it costs zero ACT.
Each time this Unit is the target of a Melee Combat attack, it may re-roll up to _ of its Armor Saves.
A Squad cannot include this Unit more than once.
A Squad cannot include this Gear more than once.
Improves this Weapon's SKL by 1.
During each of its Activations, the second time this Unit performs the Melee Combat action with this weapon costs 1 less ACT.
During each of its Activations, the second time this Unit performs the Ranged Combat action with this weapon costs 1 less ACT.
Each time this Weapon is used in Ranged Combat, the Attacker may re-roll up to _ of its Attack dice.
Each time this weapon is used in Combat, _ of this Weapon's Attack dice is an automatic Strike without rolling it. You may still choose to roll that die.

Each time the Unit uses this weapon, it fires against the target and any other Unit (including Squadmates) in Adjacent Squares Visible to the original target. Roll Attack dice for each affected Unit. Note that this weapon can target an unoccupied Square and that valid targets do not benefit from Cover.
Each time this weapon is used in Melee Combat, the Attacker may re-roll up to _ of its Melee Combat attack dice.
Perform Attack rolls against the original target and up to _ other targets in Adjacent Squares to the original target.
Attack rolls of 1 and 2 are Critical Strikes.
This Weapon's ATT is equal to this Unit's remaining HIT.

Firing this weapon after the Unit performed a Move Action costs 1 additional ACT. A Move Action performed after this Unit fired this weapon costs 1 additional ACT. Units can perform a Dash Action with this weapon equipped without any penalties.
This weapon can only be used once during each Mission.
Each time this Weapon is used in combat, targets do not benefit from Cover (no automatic saves).
This Ranged weapon can target an Enemy in an Adjacent Square to be used in Melee Combat.
Each time this weapon is used in combat, the target gets -_ ARM.
Each time this Weapon is used in combat, you may re-roll all die results of 6.
Each time this weapon is used in combat, up to _ Critical Strikes count as 3 successful strikes instead of 2.
The weapon's maximum range for target selection is _ Squares.
Instead of using the Unit's Ranged or Melee Skill, use _ as the Skill when using this weapon in combat.

Each time this Weapon is used, the Unit may select multiple targets as long as each selected target is Adjacent to another selected target. If multiple targets are selected, distribute this weapon's Attack Dice between these selected targets and perform attacks accordingly.
Each time this Unit uses this weapon, if it rolls at least one Critical Strike, the target gets -1 ACT in its next Activation (minimum 2).
